artist: Artist: André Thomkins; Publisher: Karl Gerstner; Publisher: Daniel Spoerri; Publisher: Galerie der Spiegel, Cologne, Germany
creditline: Transfer from the MIA Research and Reference Library; The John R. Van Derlip Library Fund, 1969
description: black clamshell box containing cardboard with ten hexagonal cards printed with words in German, French and English in purple, blue and red; cards attached to backing with metal bolts
medium: Mixed media multiple consisting of offset lithography on cardboard and paper, metal bolts, wood, cloth over cardboard, ribbon
provenance: Acquired in 1969 by the MIA Research and Reference Library through the John Russell Van Derlip Library Fund.
signed: on inner spine, in black: [André Thompkins]
title: Dogmat Mot
